website_summaries.verdict: Ariat designed the Terrain Waterproof to stand up to most types of outdoor conditions. Its comfort, lightness and sufficient ankle support were testaments to its well-deserved applause. Add to that is its efficient waterproofing and commendable fit and sizing. However, concerns were raised when owners experienced durability issues. Taking everything into account, the Ariat Terrain Waterproof seems to be a good choice of a mid-cut day hiking boot for tamed trails. Using it on harsh, rugged terrain might render it damaged.
pros: A huge percentage of those who bought the shoe testified to its virtually no breaking in period
It was very comfortable, according to numerous wearers
Scores of owners mentioned that it runs true to size
The Ariat Terrain Waterproof offered great ankle support, based on plenty of user reviews
A handful of outdoor lovers lauded its versatility
The lightness of the Terrain Waterproof from Ariat received approval from the majority
Most online purchasers testified to the efficient waterproofing of this day hiking boot
An expert reviewer and a couple of hikers loved the accommodating fit of the Terrain Waterproof
cons: A considerable number of users were crestfallen when the outsole and the toe guard separated from the rest of the boot too soon
A few noted that the Terrain Waterproof should have more aggressive lugs to be suitable for hiking

customer_reviews.title: Women with wide feet...take note!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!! Following foot surgery a few years ago, I have been unable to fit in the Women's Terrain. They have been my favorite shoe for years now. I don't know why it took me so long to try the men's version in 9EE (they don't make Women's Terrains in wide widths in size 10-11). I finally tried them, and I am once again a "happy camper" Note to Ariat: PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE...make more wide width options in Women's sizes 10-11!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Blichmann

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shoe my carpenter, always busy outdoors, love to walk husband will wear for leisure or work! Has worn only these for past few years and swears by them for comfort and good support. Granted, they don't last as long as work boot and he is really hard on his shoes/boots, but ,for him, they last a year or 2. He is a very active person and he loves this shoe. Highly recommend it. They fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rural Princess

customer_reviews.title: All the things I treasure: quality, comfort and protection from the elements in a great boot.
customer_reviews.text: This is particularly addressed to ladies with wide feet. I was waiting for these to be available in a women's wide 10, but I didn't want to wait forever. So I ordered them in a men's 10D width. They're perfect!!! They're darker in reality. Like the copper color from Ariat. These are so supportive and comfortable! I was in a job that had me running on my feet on concrete for the better part of 30 years. As a result, my feet are pretty much trashed. With fall and winter approaching, I wanted water proofed footwear. Thanks Ariat!
customer_reviews.author: North star

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I work in farming and I am on my feet nonstop. Regular boots just weren’t cutting it for me anymore. Then from the sky these bad boys came into my life. They hold up well for the price point and have saved my back. I will be ordering more as the time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are well made boots I use for work. On my feet all day, it's most important to have good shoes. These are it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother who has terrible foot problems and he has been very pleased with them. They fit his wide foot comfortably and he feels he has less pain walking distances.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots. Outstanding construction.
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots! Have always had Timberlands but my last pair started separating at the soles and the soles wore out pretty fast. Just not built like they used to be. My wife purchased a pair of these Ariets and man are they sharp looking. I'm an 8.5 and they fit perfectly. Just finished spraying with Kiwi Boot Protector. 24 hrs drying time and water beads off. Been wearing every day to break in and the 1st couple hours feels like I been wearing for months. Great boots guys! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MikeC

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in a timely manner.... they look good, fit well and are very comfortable.
